sentences.en: Additionally, the Raider gains a + 2 bonus to any Ride checks.
sentences.cn: 同时, 掠袭者在任何骑乘检定中都得到+2加值.

sentences.en: Colin: Have you seen the Angeline Jolie movie Tomb Raider?
sentences.cn: 科林: 你看了安吉丽娜·朱丽的电影《古墓丽影》了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Did the tomb raider routine come from wanting daddy's attention?
sentences.cn: 你这么爱冒险是为了引起你爸的注意 吧 ?

sentences.en: Ferocious Fighter: The Raider gains a + 2 bonus to Initiative.
sentences.cn: 凶猛斗士: 掠袭者的先攻骰可以得到+2加值.

sentences.en: I never even saw your cattle. Do I look a cattle - raider?
sentences.cn: 我可从来没见过你的牛, 还是说你觉得我看起来像偷牛人?

sentences.en: In the principles and Methods : That are being developed in, the Raider.
sentences.cn: 在原理和方法上也是林林总总, 各出奇兵.

sentences.en: Police said the raider fled empty - handed.
sentences.cn: 警方表示盗墓者一无所获而逃.

sentences.en: Raider Buggies and Venoms work extremely well as do Black Hands and Flame Tanks.
sentences.cn: 四驱车和毒液是相当有效的,还有黑手和火焰坦克也是.

sentences.en: The Desert Raider is an Israeli - designed fast attack vehicle.
sentences.cn: 沙漠袭击者是一种以色列设计的快速攻击车.

sentences.en: The Raider may choose to make a ferocious attack once during an encounter.
sentences.cn: 掠袭者可以在一次遭遇中使用一次野蛮攻击.

sentences.en: The Raider stays on the air.
The raider, cornered at length, will overwhelm one weak vessel and escape.
sentences.cn: 袭击舰即便最后被它们团团围住, 它也会摧毁其中一艘较弱的巡洋舰, 突围而出.

sentences.en: The strangest aspect of the Tusken Raider is the mysterious relationship with the bantha.
sentences.cn: 塔斯肯袭击者最奇特之处就是他们与班萨之间的神秘联系.

sentences.en: Tomb Raider was one of the best selling games ever.
sentences.cn: 《古墓丽影》是迄今为止销量最好的游戏之一.

sentences.en: Tomb Raider: Anniversary is planned for May 2007, on PC, PS 2 and PSP.
sentences.cn: 《周年纪念: 周年纪念》将会在2007年5月上市, 占据PC, PS2以及PSP三 大平台.

trans.tran_cn: 袭击者，侵入者，扰乱者，进行袭击、抢劫或搜查的人，进行突袭的舰队、飞机等
